attributes.action: Let us OPT of the current N.I and Income Tax System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should be able to pay reduced rates of national insurance and income tax, and pay for our own medical insurance instead of an already over worked NHS, No State pentions as we would be able to afford to put in to our own pentions.

Obviously we still have to help look after those who can not work but why should it be at a lost to our quality of life i.e better medical care because we would be able to afford it

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
